name: Whispers (itch) (N.S. Dawn)
description:
Whispers is a game that dumps you in the shoes of someone else,  a small adventure story that forces the reader to approach solving a crime with less than complete information, and in less than perfect circumstances. 

Features

> Whispers is a short, interactive novel that features puzzle-like decision making to advance the story.

> Approximate length: ~45 minutes.

Playing Whispers

> Whispers is written for HTML and can be run directly from this page by clicking Run Game. However, a download link is also available at the bottom of the page.

> The game is fully free, but any donations are very appreciated :).
